title: Powell Dubious on March Cut, Markets Slide
text: Markets pulled back from their steady trading levels today — three of which were in the red all session; only the Dow kept its head above water through the morning — once Fed Chair Jerome Powell, speaking at his press conference following the latest Fed meeting, expressed he was agnostic about a March rate cut. Indices jumped higher on the Fed's release initially, but in terms of forecasting a March move lower than the current 5.25-5.50% interest rate levels, Powell said that this was “not the most-likely case.

title: Should Investors Buy the Dip in Alphabet or Microsoft Stock After Earnings?
text: Over the last year, Alphabet and Microsoft's stock have soared +41% and +60% respectively and investors may be wondering if today's selloff is a buying opportunity.

title: Amazon's massive earnings-growth story is about to be on display once again
text: Amazon.com Inc.'s big year of earnings improvement is expected to have culminated with some eye-popping growth during the holiday quarter.

title: 3 Tech Stocks Set for a Post-Earnings Take Off
text: Tech stocks have been hot property over the past few months. With the growing adoption of Artificial Intelligence and the massive demand for data centers, several companies are making the most of this phase and reporting impressive revenue numbers.

title: Here is Why Growth Investors Should Buy Amazon (AMZN) Now
text: Amazon (AMZN) possesses solid growth attributes, which could help it handily outperform the market.

title: Red Sea container traffic is down almost 30% amid Houthi attacks, says IMF, as experts weigh wider impact
text: Houthi attacks on cargo ships have cut Red Sea container traffic by almost 30% since late last year, according to the International Monetary Fund.

title: 3 AI Stocks Primed for Unprecedented Growth in 2024
text: Investors can't seem to get enough of artificial intelligence (AI) stocks. Many corporations specializing in this industry have experienced tremendous stock gains over the past year.

title: Microsoft And Google Cloud Growth Impressed. Can Amazon Follow?
text: Analysts say Microsoft's and Google's cloud results are a positive sign for Amazon Web Services' fourth-quarter sales.

title: Amazon earnings preview: AWS, advertising, AI in the spotlight for holiday quarter results
text: Amazon will report its holiday quarter 2023 earnings on Thursday.

title: Missed Out on Nvidia? 2 AI Stocks to Buy Before They Soar in 2024.
text: Nvidia's stock soared nearly 240% last year, making it an expensive option for investing in AI. However, Alphabet is a far cheaper option with solid prospects in AI.

title: Consumer Confidence Reaches 2-Year High, Fuels Retail Growth
text: Amid slowing inflation and expectations of interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, consumer confidence has reached a two-year high.

title: 2 upgraded food stocks with super-sized gain potential
text: Signs of a soft economic landing and hopes for an aggressive Fed rate cut campaign have helped the S&P 500 finish higher in 12 of the last 13 weeks. Come Friday's closing bell, will it be 13 of 14?

title: Alphabet results could bode well for Amazon and Meta, says Wedbush
text: Google parent Alphabet's Inc.'s fourth-quarter results could spell good news for Amazon.com Inc. and Meta Platforms Inc. who are on deck this week, according to Wedbush analyst Dan Ives.

title: Could MercadoLibre Be the Next Amazon?
text: MercadoLibre has found success by following a similar playbook to Amazon. Both stocks have delivered excellent returns.

title: 3 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks You Should Buy and Keep Forever
text: Nvidia's end-to-end AI platform helped build its staggering market share. Amazon's cloud platform is a prime distribution for AI products.

title: Amazon's abandoned acquisition leaves iRobot in Carlyle debt straightjacket
text: The collapse of iRobot's $1.4 billion sale to Amazon will test the cash-strapped robot vacuum cleaner maker's ability to repay a $200 million loan it took from private equity firm Carlyle Group last year.

title: Warren Buffett Has $177 Billion Invested in These "Magnificent Seven" Stocks. Here's Which 1 Could Soar the Most in 2024.
text: Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway portfolio includes two "Magnificent Seven" stocks. One of these stocks is likely to soar the most in 2024 thanks to strong earnings growth and a key catalyst.

title: Will Amazon Be Worth More Than Apple by 2030?
text: Apple outperformed Amazon over the past five years. Amazon faces more macro and competitive challenges than Apple.
